params.title: Thinking, Innovating, and Changing
params.about_text1: My work is to find a story hiding behind a lot of noisy numbers. Sometimes, I misinterpret the story, sometimes it remains a mystery, but whenever I unearth the actual story, that little part of my work is ravishing.
params.about_text2: Things I know:- My strength is Mathematics. I have a decent knowledge of probability, statistics, linear algebra, calculus, machine learning algorithms, like linear regression, logistic regression, support vector machine, K-nearest neighbors, decision trees, random forest, na√Øve Bayes, ensemble learning, dimensionality reduction, model processing, parameter hyper-tuning, feature selection, and neural networks.
params.about_text3: I can code on Python and Excel VBA. I am comfortable with python libraries Like NumPy, pandas, scikit learn, Matplotlib, seaborn, Selenium, plotly, RE, TensorFlow, flask framework, etc. I can also work on data visualization tools like Tableau, and Power BI as well. Most of my work revolves around natural language processing and classification problems.
